about_the_game:
Contains parts of "Stage 1" and "Stage 3" of the full version.
The following are included as playable characters with various abilities:
- Bill, Lance, Ariana, and Probotector

*You will receive a special bonus when you play the full version of the game, if you have a save data after clearing the demo.
*Progress in the demo version cannot be carried over to the full version.
*The content of the demo version differs from that of the full version.

short_description: The legendary Contra series returns! This reimagining of the classic run-'n'-gun action game from the ‘80s features new stages, new enemies, new play mechanics, and co-op combat for up to 4 players!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
